message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.SY

This paper deals with prediction strategies, which are commonly studied in the machine learning and artificial intelligence communities (cs.LG, cs.AI). The use of Markov prediction strategies also suggests a focus on probabilistic modeling and inference (cs.IT, cs.DS). Additionally, the mention of a loss function and the construction of a universal prediction strategy suggest a connection to control theory and optimization (cs.SY).
